about_the_game:
The Game


Sovereign is a PvPvE Fantasy Extraction RPG. Quest, Loot, and Fight against dangerous opponents before escaping with the resources you collected. Level your character and skills to become the ultimate Sovereign! Explore and Discover the mysteries and deep lore of the world. Play the way you want and customize your character as you wish!

The game will feature a wide range of quests that will challenge players to explore the game's world. Trading with other players and NPCs will also be a great way to get new gear to help you along your journey.

Key Features

  • PvPvE
  • LOOTING
  • QUESTING
  • CRAFTING
  • EXPLORATION
  • CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
  • CO-OP MULTIPLAYER
  • AND MORE...

Play with friends


Sovereign features a co-op multiplayer experience. Join up with your friends to increase your chances of surviving the dangerous worlds while you quest and loot together. Just be warned that other players will also be working together to gain the same loot.

Suited For You


Not only will character customization play a part in Sovereign but so will the great variety in weapons and spells. From bows and arrows, to axes, to swords and shields and armor, Sovereign has got you covered. The game will have a skill tree to allow for players maximize their stats to their own playstyle.

content_descriptors.notes:
Sovereign contains dismemberment during combat that some players might find violent.
Note: This can be toggled off in the menu.

Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board Sound

Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1000 Series+

  • Sound Card: On Board Sound

short_description: Sovereign is a multiplayer fantasy extraction looter RPG, with an immersive directional combat system. Fight your way through PvPvE encounters and climb your way to become the Sovereign of this lore-filled world.
